.tm-modal-<type>-<accent>:
  .tm-modal-header
    .tm-modal-header-title
    .tm-modal-herder-cancel (dialog/content)
  .tm-modal-body
    .tm-modal-body-alert
    .tm-modal-body-dialog
    .tm-modal-body-content

modals:
  alert=success/warning/error/info:
  dialog=info:
    body:
      msg
      input
      submit

back: fix prep
minimized: fix prep
minimized: save/restore

Shift+a - search active jobs

twins - скачать pdf, нажать на кнопку out of corner

crl - закупка hw
